sku.description: Limit result set to products with a specific SKU.

attribute.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set. Default is 10.

page.description: Current page of the collection. Default is 1.

after.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date (eg. 2023-05-07T10:00:00).

before.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date (eg. 2023-10-07T12:10:16).

modified_after.description: Limit response to resources modified after a given ISO8601 compliant date. (eg. 2023-05-07T10:00:00).

status.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status. Options: any, draft, pending, private and publish. Default is any.

stock_status.description: Limit result set to products with specified stock status. Options: instock, outofstock and onbackorder.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending. Options: asc and desc. Default is desc.
